name: IND_INTERPRT_ACTV_SCORE
description: This table extracts the interpreted activity score for each variant on the order stored in INDICATOR_REL_ORD_TBL. The corresponding variant can be found in INDICATOR_REL_ORD_VARIANT for matching values of PAT_INDICATOR_ID, GROUP_LINE, and VALUE_LINE.

columns.name: PAT_INDICATOR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the patient indicator record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: INTERPRT_ACTIVITY_SCORE
columns.description: This item represents the variant activity score when it is calculated from a genotype-activity score mapping table using the variant genotype.
